attributes.action: ISP/mobile provider to check sex offenders register victims receive compensation
attributes.additional_details: Quote from Judge John Pini QC “For every image whether it is a still photograph or a video, that you have viewed and for every image that you have shared somewhere in the world, a very young child has been seriously sexually abused. These are real children who have had their lives destroyed. Your internet service provider issued a warning notice to you about what you were doing. That warning spelled out the consequences to you. You full well knew the consequences of what you were doing
attributes.background: A check of Sex Offender Register to be carried out by mobile phone/ISP prior to opening an account. Regular follow up checks to be made to ensure no child pornography/ child grooming has been carried out. If it has, then providers to be fined and monies to be given to victims as compensation

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 

You may wish to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/202901

Otherwise, you could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
